caption.p: Scavenging activity of TT in vitro. (a) Percentage DPPH radical scavenging activity of TT; (b) Percentage ABTS • + radical scavenging activity of TT; (c) Percentage hydroxyl radical scavenging ability of TT. Each bar represents the mean ± SD of three replicates. TT: Methanol fruit extract of Tetrapleura tetraptera; DPPH: 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl; ABTS: 2,2′-Azino-bis(3-ethylbenzthiazoline-6-sulfonic acid).
